name: Magic Alpha
description:
Magic Alpha - There’s something mystical in the air. It could be that Nymera, the magic Alpha is in town.  Known for her mind reading  and magical abilities,  she exudes confidence and cockiness. Arya hear’s the news that Nymera is around but think’s Nymera is all bark. So she decides to challenge her.  Arya offered a wager  neither side could pass up. If Arya wins, Nymera the magic alpha will grant her one magic wish. If Nymera the magic alpha win’s l, Arya must do her bidding, but is that all there is to it? Nymera has 10 tries to guess the correct number Arya is thinking of. Is she really magical? Or barking mad?

Is that the only challenge?
